grow_event_type_ice/3901_1301_0100_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Wanna have a Pokémon battle with me?
Let’s catch up later!
grow_event_type_ice/3902_1031_0100_10:
A new wind is blowing...
If only I could ride it...
grow_event_type_ice/3902_1301_0100_10:
Face me in battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
This training session will be a guiding wind
to help you soar in battle against Iris!
grow_event_type_ice/3903_1031_0100_10:
I’m ready for a tough
battle with a tough
sync pair!
grow_event_type_ice/3903_1301_0100_10:
You just did some training with Kahili, right?
Come on! I’ve been itching for a battle!
I’m going all out this time!
